title: Logging onto chat services...
body:
I have been playing this game for quite a while. I play this game on macbook air and i'm not having a lot of troubles with the gameplay but 1 major problem is that every time in try and logging in from my account or anyone's it says Logging onto chat services... Before I had to quit and re-login about 3-4 times to join the chat services but now it's not even logging into chat.. 
I have tried changing the date & time, re-installed the game and yet it still doesn't work.

replies.body:
Hey Summoner,

Could you visit the [Connection Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and perform all the steps there? Let me know if anything helps.

-DTN
I don't think this website relates to logging onto chat services.. because my internet is fine just not logging onto chat.
